item.title: :confetti_ball:Happy New Year:confetti_ball:
item.description: A very welcomed Happy New Year to you all and welcome to my personal site. I’ll consider this place as a showcase, note collection, and possibly a source of information. My primary focus is around Linux, Python, containers and several automation tools. However, I dip into many areas and categories so stick around to see if anything catches your fancy.
